verses.text: It is a* good thing* to give thanks unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High:
To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,+ 92.2 every…: Heb. in the nights*
Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.+ 92.3 the harp…: or, the solemn sound with the harp*+ 92.3 a solemn…: Heb. Higgaion*
For thou, \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.
O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, how great are thy works! and* thy thoughts are very deep.
A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; it is* that they shall be destroyed for ever:
But thou, \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, art most* high for evermore.
For, lo, thine enemies, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of* an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.
Mine eye also shall see my desire* on mine enemies, and* mine ears shall hear my desire* of the wicked that rise up against me.
The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
Those that be planted in the house of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall flourish in the courts of our God.
They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing;+ 92.14 flourishing: Heb. green*
To shew that the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* upright: he is* my rock, and there is* no unrighteousness in him.
